pages.text: You who believe, when you whisper to the messenger, then give to charity before your whispering. This is better and purer for you. And if you did not find (it affordable), then indeed God is forgiving and merciful

Were you afraid of giving to charity before your whispering? So when you did not do it and God turned to you (and forgave you), then perform the mandatory prayer and give to the mandatory charity and obey God and His messenger. God is well informed of what you do
Did you not see those who turn (in friendship) to people whom God's anger is upon them? They are not from you and (you are) not from them, and they swear falsely while they know
God prepared a severe punishment for them, for what they were doing is indeed bad
They took their oath as a shield to obstruct (people) from God's way, so they have a humiliating punishment
Their possessions and children are of no use against God at all. They are inhabitants of the fire, remaining in there forever
On a day that God raises them all, then they swear for Him as they swear for you, and they think that they are on to something. Know that indeed they are liars
Satan overcame them and made them forget God's remembrance, they are Satan's party. Know that indeed Satan's party, they are the losers
Indeed those who oppose God and His messenger, they are among the lowest ones
God prescribed: I and My messengers shall be victorious. God is indeed strong and powerful
